rows.label: qst201107_msg0037
rows.name: Hey, Rex, you know, don't you?

rows.label: qst201107_msg0038
rows.name:
...I think it might be better
if you didn't know, Mikumari.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0039
rows.name:
If you learn the truth,
you'll surely...

rows.label: qst201107_msg0040
rows.name: But I'm curious!

rows.label: qst201107_msg0041
rows.name:
You know my personality, right?
I won't get depressed, I'll bounce
back positively in a flash.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0042
rows.name:
Rex... Let's trust
Mikumari and tell her.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0043
rows.name: Yeah... You're right.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0044
rows.name: Thank you.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0001
rows.name: Her name is Seori.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0002
rows.name: Seori...

rows.label: qst201107_msg0003
rows.name:
Yes, Seori and you,
Mikumari, were allies.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0004
rows.name:
...Allies? So we were
together like we are now?

rows.label: qst201107_msg0005
rows.name:
Yes... But you weren't
exactly doing good things.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0006
rows.name:
You two were once called Core Crystal
hunters, attacking people everywhere
and stealing Core Crystals.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0007
rows.name: I did such terrible things...?

rows.label: qst201107_msg0008
rows.name: Then, was I your enemy, Rex?

rows.label: qst201107_msg0009
rows.name: Yes, that's right.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0010
rows.name:
To stop the Core Crystal hunting,
we cooperated with the Superbian
army and fought against you...

rows.label: qst201107_msg0011
rows.name: ...And Mikumari's Driver died.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0012
rows.name:
So that's when I returned
to a Core Crystal once...

rows.label: qst201107_msg0013
rows.name: Yes, and we retrieved it.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0014
rows.name: But we let Seori and her Driver escape.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0015
rows.name:
We hadn't been able to
find them since then.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0016
rows.name: To think I was an ally to criminals...

rows.label: qst201107_msg0017
rows.name:
Mikumari... Don't worry too
much about the past...

rows.label: qst201107_msg0018
rows.name: The current Mikumari is our ally.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0019
rows.name:
...But I'm guessing that Seori girl
doesn't see it that way, right?

rows.label: qst201107_msg0020
rows.name: To her, I must be a traitor, so...

rows.label: qst201107_msg0021
rows.name: Calm down, Mikumari.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0022
rows.name:
We won't know what Seori thinks
of you until we meet her.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0023
rows.name:
But if you do meet her, you
will surely face some pain.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0024
rows.name: Even so, will you go to meet her?

rows.label: qst201107_msg0027
rows.name:
Hearing that I was a villain in
the past was a huge shock...

rows.label: qst201107_msg0028
rows.name: But... I think I can't stay depressed.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0029
rows.name:
Because, just as you all saved me,
the feeling of wanting to save her
is overflowing within me...

rows.label: qst201107_msg0030
rows.name: So I want to go and meet her!

rows.label: qst201107_msg0031
rows.name:
...I understand, Mikumari. Let's
all go and save her together!

rows.label: qst201107_msg0032
rows.name: Are you sure, Rex?

rows.label: qst201107_msg0033
rows.name:
There's no point in worrying
about it here. ...Besides, I
want to save Seori too.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0034
rows.name: Let's go, Mikumari!

rows.label: qst201107_msg0035
rows.name: Yeah!
